heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the sacred origins of Ayahuasca and how it can help you heal.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced facilitators who will accompany you on your journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound experience. Find our recommendations here.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay updated on our upcoming events, read testimonials, and be part of our healing family.
footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your healing journey.
registerSuccessDescription: We've sent a verification link to your email.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at the moment. Check back soon!
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details below.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or provide a URL.
editHeroVideoDescription: Replace the main video on the homepage.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This will permanently remove the guide from the list.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage the content and settings of the application.
guidesPageSubtitle: Our team of experienced facilitators is here to support you with love, respect, and deep wisdom. We are committed to creating a safe and sacred space for your transformation.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral brew from the Amazon, made from the combination of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine and the Chacruna leaf. It has been used for centuries by indigenous communities for healing, spiritual connection, and self-discovery.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The medicine works on a physical, emotional, and spiritual level. It can induce profound visions and introspective states, allowing for deep emotional cleansing, the release of traumas, and a greater understanding of oneself and the universe.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches and guides. Each experience is unique and personal, offering the lessons that the participant needs at that moment in their life.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many people experience a renewed sense of purpose, mental clarity, and a deeper connection with their spiritual path after a ceremony.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It facilitates the release of emotional blockages, traumas, and negative patterns, promoting deep and lasting healing.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionTitle: Connection with Nature and the Universe
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It expands consciousness and fosters a sense of unity with all forms of life, generating profound respect for nature.
groupCeremonyDescription: A shared experience where the collective energy amplifies the healing. Ideal for feeling the support and connection of a community.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized session for those seeking a one-on-one experience with the guide and the medicine.
notFoundDescription: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
authRequiredDescription: You must be signed in to reserve a spot. Please log in or create an account.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Your body and mind are the sacred vessels for this experience. Proper preparation is an act of respect for yourself and the medicine, allowing you to receive its gifts with clarity and openness.
preparationProcessDescription: You register and fill out the medical questionnaire to ensure the experience is safe for you.
ceremonyProcessDescription: You participate in the sacred ritual, guided by our expert facilitators in a safe and supportive environment.
experienceProcessDescription: You navigate your inner world, release emotions, and receive the insights the medicine has for you.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we support you so you can apply the lessons learned in your daily life and continue your growth.
dietSubtitle: Three days before and after the ceremony, we recommend following these guidelines to purify your body and honor the medicine.
allowedFoodsList: • Fresh fruits and vegetables • Whole grains (rice, quinoa) • Legumes (lentils, chickpeas) • Grilled chicken or fish (without strong seasonings) • Plenty of water
prohibitedFoodsList: • Red and processed meats • Dairy and fermented products • Refined sugars and spicy foods • Caffeine and alcohol • Sexual relations
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mental state and intentions are fundamental to the experience. Here are some recommended practices.
meditationDescription: Dedicate at least 15 minutes a day to meditate, calm your mind, and connect with your breath. This will help you navigate the experience with more serenity.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what brings you to the medicine. What do you wish to heal? What questions are you looking to answer? Write down your intentions to give direction to your journey.
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes before the ceremony. It will be a valuable tool for later integration.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can bring deep-seated and repressed emotions to the surface. Allow yourself to feel without judgment. The ceremony is a safe space to release what no longer serves you. Trust the process and the guidance of our facilitators.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare for a comfortable and meaningful night.
comfortItemsList: • Comfortable and warm clothing (in layers) • Blanket and pillow (optional) • Personal water bottle • Personal object or amulet (optional)
essentialsList: • An open mind and heart • Your personal intentions • A spirit of respect for the medicine, facilitators, and other participants.
authRequiredJourneyDescription: Sign in or create an account to access our preparation guide and begin your transformation.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you enter a phone number.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: Please check your new email address for a verification link.
enterPasswordToConfirm: Please enter your current password to confirm this change.

questionnaireExperienceDesc: This helps us understand your level of experience.

questionnaireIntentionDesc: What are you looking to heal, understand, or explore?

myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: This is a summary of the information you provided.
noAnswersSubmitted: You have not submitted any answers yet.

userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users in the application.

sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review the user's submitted answers below.
invitationTabDescription: Manage the WhatsApp message templates for inviting users to complete the questionnaire.
newTemplateMessageES: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at El Arte de Sanar. You can do it here: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/artedesanar
newTemplateMessageEN: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at The Art of Healing. You can do it here: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/artedesanar
selectInvitationTemplateDescription: Choose a message to send to {{name}} via WhatsApp.
invitationSent: WhatsApp opened with the pre-filled message.
chatbotWelcome: Welcome to El Arte de Sanar. I am your spiritual guide. How can I help you on your path to healing today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again in a moment.
errorLogsSubtitle: Review system errors to maintain application health.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete this error log.
deleteAllLogsConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete ALL error logs. This action cannot be undone.
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the captured error.
backupSubtitle: Export or import all application data.
exportDataDescription: Download a JSON file with all Firestore data.
importDataDescription: Import data from a JSON file. This will overwrite existing data.
importWarningDescription: Importing this file will overwrite all existing data in the database. A backup of the current state will be created automatically. Are you sure you want to continue?
importSuccessDescription: The database has been updated with the new data.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before the last import. You can restore it if the import caused issues.
rollbackWarningDescription: This will overwrite the current data with the backup created before the last import. Are you sure?
rollbackSuccessDescription: The database has been restored to its previous state.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all conversations with the AI spiritual guide.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
analyticsDescription: Track user clicks on different sections of the homepage.
resetAnalyticsConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all click tracking data. This action is irreversible.
myCeremoniesSubtitle: Here are the ceremonies you are registered for.
noAssignedCeremoniesDescription: You haven't been assigned to any ceremonies. Explore our upcoming events to find your next journey.
assignCeremonyDescriptionAdmin: Select the ceremonies this user will be assigned to.
noCeremoniesFound: No ceremonies have been created yet.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. This is useful for completed events.
errorFinishingCeremony: Failed to mark ceremony as finished.
resetCountersConfirmDescription: This will reset the view and click counts for this ceremony to zero.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will hide the ceremony from regular users but keep it visible for admins. Useful for drafts or postponed events.
formRegisterRequired: Require user to be logged in to reserve
authRequiredCeremoniesDescription: You must be logged in to view all available ceremonies.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming and past events. Find the perfect experience for your journey of transformation.
resetQuestionnaireConfirmDescription: This will delete all of {{name}}'s answers and reset their preparation progress. They will have to start over. Are you sure?

coursesDescription: Here you will find a series of videos to prepare you for your ceremony. The required videos are essential to understand the process.
noCoursesInCategory: There are no courses in this category yet.
